about_the_game:
SORROW is a third person survival game set 2 weeks after the outbreak of a brutal parasitic entity. It follows the perspective of a survivor who has survived the initial chaos, and now has to survive the harsh reality of a American continent after humanity's dominance has been tipped.

Your main objective is to survive by any means possible, including murder. The creatures that you once called a human didn't lose their intelligence, and will be able to flank you, dodge your attacks, and even vault over obstacles you do. However, it is best to remember one thing, nothing lasts forever. Your randomized character will inevitably meet their end.

Features:

  • multiple towns in different parts of the USA (New Mexico, Texas, Colorado, etc)

  • randomized interiors for each house/building. no two are the same!

  • A choice between stealth or action at the start of every playthrough.

  • Basic survival mechanics alongside a infection meter that fills up when being attacked, don't let it get too high or you'll turn.

  • Completely randomized characters, you could have a man who was keen on melee one playthrough while another could be better at stealth.

  • A radio system that chronicles the downfall of civilization

  • House securing system, barricade windows and block doors to delay the attacks of the creatures. (only on houses in rural areas)

  • Multiplayer included (peer-2-peer)!

best of all? it's completely FREE!

story mode is planned however won't come until after full release.

content_descriptors.notes: Sorrow is meant to pull no punches in it's violence, even if the monsters you fight aren't human, they were at one point.
